original_title: Max Felicitas: The Hot Adventures of an Italian Nerd
overview: The hottest and most exciting encounters of our Max Felicitas. Lucky Max is sick, he has a fever, he immediately calls the doctor… and Malena arrives, a sexy and eager doctor and while he visits him she discovers that the boy is well endowed and he doesn't want to let this opportunity pass! Max contacts a model via Instagram, Lisa Amane, and launches a challenge, if he wins he gives her € 5,000, if she loses she will have to shoot a porn scene with him. Then he meets two naughty and insatiable girls who will literally drive him crazy and finally with Giorgia Roma Max he will have to see if the girl has all the requirements to be his secretary!
title: Max Felicitas: The Hot Adventures of an Italian Nerd
